## Exercises

**Option 1: Posit Cloud**

You must be part of the CEDS Workshops Posit Cloud work space to access the project linked below.

**<https://posit.cloud/spaces/504211/content/8064826>**

**Option 2: Download locally**

Fill in `destdir` with the location where you want to download the project. Delete this argument to download to your desktop.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# install.packages("usethis")
usethis::use_course(
    "https://github.com/jadeynryan/parameterized-quarto-workshop/raw/main/exercises/exercises.zip"
    , destdir = "___"
)
```
:::
